name: manage_droplinked_product
description: Complete product management for Droplinked. CRITICAL: Always pass ALL relevant product data (title, description, collection_choice, price, quantity, weight) with EVERY action call to maintain state. The action parameter determines what step to perform.

action.description: REQUIRED: The action to perform. create_product=collect data only, upload_images=MUST use when user uploads image files, generate_ai_mockups=create AI-enhanced mockups from uploaded image, show_summary=display summary before creation, confirm_creation=actually create the product.

title.description: Product title/name. ALWAYS include if known.

description.description: Product description. ALWAYS include if known.

collection_choice.description: User's collection choice (1, 2, 3, etc.). CRITICAL: Always include this when user provides a collection number.

price.description: Product price in USD. ALWAYS include if known.

quantity.description: Product quantity (-1 for unlimited). ALWAYS include if known.

weight.description: Product weight for shipping. ALWAYS include if known.

image_urls.description: Array of uploaded image URLs. CRITICAL: When user uploads image files, use action='upload_images' with these URLs. When user says 'continue' or 'create' after images, include the uploaded image URLs from previous upload_images responses.

skip_images.description: Set to true to skip image upload

use_ai_mockups.description: Set to true when user wants AI-generated mockups from their uploaded image. Ask user if they want AI mockups after they upload an image.
